title: Canary Club
text:
Canary Club (キャナァーリ倶楽部, Kyanāri Kurabu) is a Japanese girl group, founded by Tsunku in 2007 within his Nice Girl Project!.
The group debuted in 2007 with the single "SWEET & TOUGHNESS" as a nine-member group. After two albums, six singles and various line-up changes between 2007 and 2011, Canary Club was transferred to Space Craft Group in 2011 with all members transferring except for Chihira Mochida, who remained a member of the group under TNX until her departure from the label in January 2015.. Since transferring, Canary Club have released songs for the games Rhythm Heaven and Rhythm Heaven Fever in 2008 and 2011 respectively.
In a blog post discussing her departure, Chihara Mochida revealed that Canary Club went on hiatus in May 2012 to focus on individual activities.


== Members ==
Can's (subunit)

Mana Ogawa (小川真奈, nickname: Ogamana), born  (1993-07-02) July 2, 1993
Ayumi Takada (高田あゆみ, nickname: Ayubee), born  (1984-10-20) October 20, 1984
Aries (subunit)

Mikiho Niwa (丹羽未来帆, nickname: Mikki), born  (1989-09-27) September 27, 1989
Ikuko Ōura (大浦育子, nickname: Ikucchi), born  (1989-09-22) September 22, 1989


=== Former members ===
Can's
Riho Sugiura (杉浦里穂, nickname: Rippon), born  (1992-02-03) February 3, 1992 — left in January 2009
Erina Hashiguchi (橋口恵莉奈, nickname: Eri~na), born  (1996-11-18) November 18, 1996 — left in June 2009
Aries
Yuma Uchida (内田由麻, nickname: Ucchi), born  (1994-11-07) November 7, 1994 — left in March 2010
Reiko Okada (岡田怜子, nickname: Okkyan), born  (1993-06-19) June 19, 1993 — left in May 2011
Yurie Matsui (松井友里絵, nickname: Macchan), born  (1988-04-06) April 6, 1988 — left in May 2011
Subunit unknown
Chihira Mochida (持田千妃来, nickname: Chiichan), born  (1997-10-12) October 12, 1997 — joined in late 2009, left in January 2015
